Text.Page:
Not to mention the Vanguard Scouts, but a lot of funds were spent in the name of Elleon.

I just wish that all the things that Elleon did for the federation wouldn't end up being so useless.
Commander Seir, I heard something went wrong with the secret mission.
There haven't been any issues with the supplies for the scouts, but we need to handle some complaints fast.
Sir, I shall deliver the Archdevan Mark to Fraya.
I'll pray to Velik for your success.
